title: I feel bad for Riot, they can't do anything about the community
body:
In a ranked game and ask the other team to report a player that has been abusing me. Other team says they wont report unless we FF. What kind of attitude is that? We end up losing so I ask in post game lobby to please report the player. Everyone leaves the lobby without reporting the player except someone on the other team reports me for asking to report someone...

I've been really trying to improve my attitude but honestly, this community has no interest in making the game a better place. I feel bad for Riot because I know they invest a lot of time into trying to make the community a more positive environment, but it's just never going to happen.
